channel.title: East Asian on Recipes collected by Daniel Mentiplay

item.title: Silken tofu with celery salad
item.description: Ingredients 1 stalk celery, cut into thin 2-inch matchsticks 1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems 3 whole scallions, sliced into thin slicers at an acute bias 1/2 teaspoon toasted sichuan peppercorns 1/2 teaspoon toasted whole cumin seed 1 tablespoon sesame paste (such as tahini), or peanut butter 1 teaspoon soy sauce 2 teaspoons Chinkiang vinegar 2 teaspoons fermented chili broad bean paste 2 teaspoons sugar 1/4 cup Chinese roasted chili oil 1 medium clove garlic, finely minced (about 1 teaspoon) 600 g soft silken tofu 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds Instructions Combine celery, cilantro, and scallions in a medium bowl and cover with ice cold water.
